document.full_text: bharti airtel ltd, india's top mobile phone carrier, and its smaller rival aircel separately said on monday they would launch apple's iphone 4 in india in the coming months.
document.title: bharti, aircel to launch apple's iphone 4 in india
lines_and_colors: bharti airtel ltd, india's top mobile phone carrier, and its smaller rival aircel separately said on monday they would launch apple's iphone 4 in india in the coming months.
